title: ChapterEnumeration
description: List of all chapters/sections found in an SAP EWA document.

chapters.description: Ordered list of all chapters/sections in the document with their titles and page ranges.

chapter_id.description: Unique identifier for the chapter (e.g., CH-01, CH-02).

title.description: Full title of the chapter/section as it appears in the document.

start_page.description: Page number where this chapter begins.

end_page.description: Page number where this chapter ends. Use start_page if end is unknown.

subsections.description: List of subsections within this chapter. Use empty array if none.

total_pages.description: Total number of pages in the document.

document_type.description: Type of document (e.g., 'SAP EarlyWatch Alert', 'EWA Report').
